name: CREPUSCULAR (nonapplicabl)
description:
C R E P U S C U L A R WARNING: contains jumpscares, high pitched noises, blood, religious elements, and clowns/gnomes

This game was created by NA with the prompt of executing a non-linear narrative that revolves around a sense of place. My day job is as an artist/designer, and this project was a class project of mine that I had fun with and decided to push further. 

Based on the critiques of my professor, friends, family, and more, I hope to continue updating the game by adding more and more paths, mechanics, scares, characters, and endings.

PS: As it stands, there is currently no ending to the game. Have fun exploring and going down each path!
